abstract: If a compatible TV tuner device cannot be found to pull in live television broadcast to the computer, online streams are another way to watch.
snippet: If a compatible TV tuner device cannot be found to pull in live television broadcast to the computer, online streams are another way to watch.
lead_paragraph: Q. Do they still make USB television tuners for Mac? I can’t seem to find any that work in this country. What are other options for cord-cutters and people without TVs to watch live television on a Mac?

headline.main: Finding Ways to Get Live TV on a Mac
